name: Staff of the Winds
description: A mystical staff that controls the power of the wind.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings of swirling winds. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that glows with a pale blue light.

special_effects.wind_blast: Allows the user to summon a powerful gust of wind to knock enemies back.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather and has a simple design.

name: Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health when consumed.
looks: The healing potion is a small glass bottle filled with a glowing liquid. It emits a soft light and has a sweet aroma.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elemental forces.
looks: The staff is made of ancient oak and is adorned with glowing gemstones representing each element. As you grip the staff, you can feel the energy coursing through it.

special_effects.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.
special_effects.elemental_convergence: Unleashes a powerful burst of elemental energy that damages all enemies in a radius.

name: Enchanted Wand
description: A magical wand infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The wand has a sleek design with a crystal at its tip that glows with a soft, bright light. The handle is wrapped in velvet and adorned with silver accents.

special_effects.spell_potency: Increases the power of spells cast using this wand.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a simple design, with a straight iron blade and a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Emerald Wand
description: A magical wand adorned with a shimmering emerald.
looks: The wand is made of polished mahogany wood with intricate carvings. It has a vibrant green emerald at the tip that glows with a soft light.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast with this wand.

name: Scepter of Healing
description: A mystical scepter that enhances healing abilities.
looks: The scepter is made of pure crystal and emits a soft, soothing glow. It is adorned with intricate engravings of leaves and flowers.

special_effects.healing_aura: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Mystic Staff
description: A staff with magical properties that enhances spellcasting abilities.
looks: The staff is made of carved oak wood and is adorned with glowing crystals embedded into the handle. It emits a soft, ethereal glow.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the damage of spells by 15%
